title: Two Make Twins
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 488 words, Level L (Grade 2), Lexile 580L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     I and O
description: Twins may look similar or enjoy the same things, but every twin is a unique individual. Two Make Twins introduces students to the different types of twins and the special bond they share. This book can also be used to teach students how to compare and contrast as well as to ask and answer questions to better understand the text. The book and lesson are also available for levels I and O.
